properties.displayName: Chromium Browser Instance Executed With Custom Extension
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "--load-extension=" and (FolderPath endswith "\\brave.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\chrome.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\msedge.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\opera.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\vivaldi.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects a Chromium based browser process with the 'load-extension' flag to start a instance with a custom extens
